name.es: Áreas naturales protegidas de la Amazonía venezolana
name.en: Protected natural areas in the Venezuelan Amazon

description.es: Contiene los límites de demarcación de las áreas naturales protegidas en la Amazonía venezolana. Incluye monumentos naturales, parques nacionales, refugio de fauna silvestre, reservas de biosfera y reservas forestales.
description.en: Contains the demarcation boundaries of the protected natural areas in the Venezuelan Amazon. Includes natural monuments, national parks, wildlife refuge, biosphere reserves, and forest reserves.

tileInfo: {"type":"vector","displayAttribute":"nombre","style":{"type":"fill","paint":{"fill-color":{"type":"categorical","property":"categoria","default":"#760000","stops":[["Parque Nacional","#246400"],["Monumento Natural","#338c00"],["Refugio de Fauna Silvestre","#abd65c"],["Reserva de Biosfera","#45bc00"],["Reserva Forestal","#90ff4b"]]},"fill-opacity":0.5,"fill-outline-color":"#000"}}}
